am.desc: Wick has a very unique auto mod that is based on a heat concept. The more filters you trigger, the quicker Wick is to silence you.

an.desc: Wick brought the concept of "Anti Nuke" to Discord years ago, and the system has been perfected ever since. Wick will monitor the activity of your staff members and will react if a weird behaviour (that you specify) is met. The days of you losing your entire server are long gone.

ver.desc: You can use a 'Press to enter' type of verification or you can use Wick's custom captcha that members need to answer before gaining access to your server. Verification is super useful against raids and attacks.

ch.minid: This is the start of the #verify-here channel.

backups.desc: Take/Load backups and syncrhonize them efficiently with your server.

lockdown.desc: Lock your entire server in less than a second in case of a raid. Lock server joins or even staff member powers.

jg.desc: Have a variety of tools when it comes to your server joins. Target new accounts, suspicious accounts, accounts without a profile picture or even bots added to your server.

modcmd.desc: Mute, kick, ban, quarantine and warn members with a lot of tools and parameters offered to help you moderate efficiently and fast.

cases.desc: All moderation actions are saved as cases that you can edit, freeze or bring back. You can view the cases of a member or the cases that are issued by a moderator.

utility.desc: View the important information about a member, a role or your entire server. Check the recent actions made by your staff members.

logs.desc: Wick will log everything it does in great details. All logs are beautified and presented in an easy to read format.

q.desc: Giving dangerous permissions to your public roles? Giving a member dangerous permissions? Have Wick monitor your staff for any nuke-behavior

panicmodes.desc: Wick comes with a panic mode for each the Auto Mod and the Anti Nuke, panic modes are made to combat raids and nukes efficiently and fast.

jr.desc: Stop ANY sized raid attack targeted at your server. Wick's joinraid system is able to identify the automated accounts without harming your genuine joins.

slowmode.desc: Enforce your own slowmode in a channel or multiple at once with the delay you choose using Wick.

purge.desc: Bulk delete messages sent in a channel and specify which type of messages to target with Wick's variant filters.

extrafeatures.slow: We just don't want the page to be slow :)

block.d: All kinds of communities are using Wick to keep their members and servers safe, maybe its your turn now!

reviews.t: Reviews from large communities and websites

standard.title: Standard
standard.desc: This is the free version of the bot that is serving hundreds of thousands of servers.

premium.title: Premium
premium.desc: This is the paid version of the bot that is powering the biggest communities on Discord.

website.title: Website
website.desc: This is the website you are viewing right now alongside the dashboard and many other pages.

globalStatus.major: A major outage, all services are down.
globalStatus.issues: Some services are facing an outage.

minidesc.issues: This service is facing an ongoing outage.
